name: In re NOMINATION PETITION OF Ernest SIMON, Candidate for Senator in the General Assembly From District No. 37. Appeal of Mary L. Palmer, Joyce S. Pogozelski and Michelle Stolfer

judges: Before CAPPY, C.J., CASTILLE, NIGRO, NEWMAN, SAYLOR, EAKIN, BAER, JJ.
parties: In re NOMINATION PETITION OF Ernest SIMON, Candidate for Senator in the General Assembly From District No. 37. Appeal of Mary L. Palmer, Joyce S. Pogozelski and Michelle Stolfer.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 7th day of April 2004, we AFFIRM the Order of the Commonwealth Court.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Attorney Steven Moreno Williams, for Mary Et al Palmer.
Frank Louis Cecchetti, Pittsburgh, for Ernest Simon.
casebody.head_matter:
846 A.2d 671
In re NOMINATION PETITION OF Ernest SIMON, Candidate for Senator in the General Assembly From District No. 37. Appeal of Mary L. Palmer, Joyce S. Pogozelski and Michelle Stolfer.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
April 7, 2004.
Attorney Steven Moreno Williams, for Mary Et al Palmer.
Frank Louis Cecchetti, Pittsburgh, for Ernest Simon.
Before CAPPY, C.J., CASTILLE, NIGRO, NEWMAN, SAYLOR, EAKIN, BAER, JJ.
